channel.title: Compiler 562
channel.description:
Ok, to compile the 562 im using. right now it has: @echo off title rs2hd compiler echo Preparing... mkdir bin cd src copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk7.3\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src/com/rs2hd/Main.java pause
and i know my version of jdk is 7.3, it says that exactly in my program files. What should i put? it keeps saying "path not specified."

item.title: Compiler 562
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

aurocaido:

didnt fix it, maybe something with the compiler is wrong? its the gazaascape 562 server

Normally, I’d blame the server. But in this case my best bet is you are the problem. It doesn’t seem to me like you know exactly what you are doing, so I’m going to assume that you didn’t want to screw around with the installation path. With means your path, by default from both oracle and Sun Microsystems, should be

or

You should probably uninstall all of your jdk by going to Control Panel>Uninstall a Program>Jdk
and then reinstall java using this link.

Simply Agree to their terms. And go to the download that says, “Windows x86 - jdk-7u3-windows-i586.exe”

After that is finished installed. This is what you need your compiler to look like.

@echo off title rs2hd compiler echo Preparing... mkdir bin cd src copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src/com/rs2hd/Main.java pause

I hope this has helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler 562
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zack_of_Pwnage Owner Zack of PwnageScape
item.description:
@Owner_Zack_of_Pwnage wrote:

[quote=“austinsobes, post:2, topic:434909”]I’m not an expert in java calls. But unless you downloaded your java from somebody else, your java should be

That’s the format that oracle uses for their file paths.[/quote]
Yes, that is correct. Make sure it is in regular, not through (x86).

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler 562
item.dc:creator: @aurocaido aurocaido
item.description:
@aurocaido wrote:

Ok, to compile the 562 im using. right now it has:
@echo off
title rs2hd compiler
echo Preparing…
mkdir bin
cd src
copy log4j.xml …
cd …
move log4j.xml bin/
echo Compiling core…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk7.3\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
pause

and i know my version of jdk is 7.3, it says that exactly in my program files. What should i put? it keeps saying “path not specified.”

Read full topic
